description: Identifies potential structural weaknesses in a loan agreement based on Appendix F of the Comptroller's Handbook.

parameters.name: guideline_appendix_f_summary
parameters.description: Summary of key structural weaknesses from Appendix F.
parameters.defaultValue: Indefinite purpose, liberal repayment, weak covenants, inadequate debt service coverage, high leverage, etc.

parameters.name: loan_purpose_str
parameters.description: The stated purpose of the loan.

parameters.name: repayment_terms_str
parameters.description: Details of the loan's repayment program (source, timing, maturity).

parameters.name: covenants_summary_str
parameters.description: Summary of key financial and operational covenants.

parameters.name: leverage_ratio_str
parameters.description: Reported or calculated leverage ratio (e.g., Debt/Equity or Debt/EBITDA).

parameters.name: collateral_ltv_advance_rates_str
parameters.description: Loan-to-value or advance rates against collateral.

parameters.name: guarantor_support_details_str
parameters.description: Details on guarantor support if critical to credit decision.

parameters.name: reliance_on_projections_str
parameters.description: Notes on whether repayment relies heavily on uncommitted future events like refinancing or optimistic projections.
